niblette if your seeing this you need poweriso for the iso file.you need to mount and then install.just google it.

I downloaded this in like 3-4 hours @ 600kb/s and got all the way to the last level in just 4 hours on normal.  Took me 18 hrs to get a 1:1 seeding ratio.  

There is a problem with this game, in the first few levels you can drop items on the ground just fine.  But in the later levels, the game will freeze if you try to drop ANYTHING.  I bet they purposely did something to stop cracked games.  So if you encounter this, just don't ever press G and the game won't crash.  You can drop big items by switching or picking up new weapons though.

I also had to put msvcr71.dll in the same directory as the exe to get this working.
Where is the "crack included" part? I've searched every directory and file to no avail. Once the .iso is mounted it installs fine, but you get a securom error message trying to run it.
